summary: Mortal hero Bek teams with the god Horus in an alliance against Set, the merciless god of darkness, who has usurped Egypt's throne, plunging the once peaceful and prosperous empire into chaos and conflict.
cast: Brenton Thwaites|John Samaha|Courtney Eaton|Nikolaj Coster-Waldau|Paula Arundell|Alia Seror-O'Neill|Emily Wheaton|Elodie Yung|Rachael Blake|Bryan Brown|Michael-Anthony Taylor|Emma Booth|Felix Williamson|Chadwick Boseman|Gerard Butler|Alexander England|Rufus Sewell|Ian Roberts|Matt Ruscic|Elvis Sinosic|Daniel Mifsud|Goran D. title: Dioses de Egipto
